Now, let's place the people in the table:

| Beverage      | Milk      | Tea      |
| Food          | Peas      | Potato  |
| Movie-Genre   | Family    | Zombie   |
| Pet           | Guinea-pig| Hamster  |
| Transport     | Trike     | Motorbike|
